about_the_game:
Knock On The Window

Knock on the Window is an atmospheric horror with a VHS aesthetic that will immerse you in a mysterious story full of suspense and unexpected twists.

Story

Martin has been given an urgent assignment at work. However, for this he had to go to the house of his Boss. And so Martin found himself alone at home, in the middle of a vast field of sunflowers. Everything was going well until there was a knock on the window....

Gameplay

Knock on the Window is a walking simulator with a variety of mechanics, allowing you to explore many atmospheric locations. The detailed environments, muted tones and VHS aesthetics create a feeling of total immersion, as if you were part of an 80's horror movie. Every sound, every shadow could be hiding something sinister....

Key Features

  • Tense atmosphere

  • Diverse locations with unique details

  • VHS visual style, immersing you in retro horror aesthetics

  • Thrilling plot with unexpected twists and turns
